column4: Tesla wins U.S. antitrust approval to buy SolarCity
column5: WASHINGTON Tesla Motors Inc has won U.S. antitrust approval to buy solar panel installer SolarCity Corp  moving closer to its goal of creating a carbon-free energy and transportation company.

column5: WASHINGTON Tesla Motors Inc  has won U.S. antitrust approval to buy solar panel installer SolarCity Corp   moving closer to its goal of creating a carbon-free energy and transportation company.

column4: UPDATE 3-Tesla wins U.S. antitrust approval to buy SolarCity
column5: WASHINGTON  Aug 25 Tesla Motors Inc has won U.S. antitrust approval to buy solar panel installer SolarCity Corp  moving closer to its goal of creating a carbon-free energy and transportation company.

column4: BRIEF-Ningbo Tuopu Group signs supplier selection letter with Tesla Motors
column5: * Ningbo Tuopu Group signed a supplier selection letter with Tesla Motors on Aug. 23
